RTCIceTransportGetSelectedCandidatePair.summary:
The method
getSelectedCandidatePair() returns an
object containing the current best-choice pair
of ICE candidates describing the configuration of the endpoints of the transport.
RTCIceTransportGetSelectedCandidatePair.returns:
A object describing the configurations of the
currently-selected candidate pair's two endpoints.
describes the configuration of the
local end of the connection, while
describes the remote peer's configuration.The return value is null if no pair of candidates has been selected yet.
